title: Login screen not loading
body: When I click launch on the launcher, the login screen is meant to pop up right? But it hasn't been popping up. Anyone got solutions?

replies.body: This is often caused by a connection issue between your client and the League of Legends servers. Please ensure that you've added League of Legends as an exception to any antivirus applications and firewalls you may have running. Let me know if that fixes it for you!
I didn't know we could post on OCE using our NA accounts...

this happend before around 2 month ago pretty regular if what is suggested below dosnt work try to repatch by following this steps: There is a much easier way to fix this problem! So what you want to do is go to Local Disc< Riot games < League of Legends < RADS < Projects< lol_air_client < releases < 0.0.1.1.136 (If you dont have that one it could be others doesn't matter.) < Delete releasemanifest & S_OK. (Close tab.) Open League of Legends, then wait for it to update. (It took me about 5 minutes) When its done launch it and your finally able to play! Hope this helped. :)
Ive already done that but it still didnt work. im doing it for the second time atm
Have you done a system restore before this happening to you?

System Restore is a feature in Microsoft Windows that allows the user to revert their computer's state (including system files, installed applications, Windows Registry, and system settings) to that of a previous point in time, which can be used to recover from system malfunctions or other problems.     

I presume you didn't system restore..So try to repair your client you can do this by following this steps :) 

Open up the LoL game client.

At the top right hand part of the screen there will be an icon that looks like a 'question mark'.

Click it.

It will open up a window with an option to repair.

Click Repair.
